demala janathawage ekama niyojithaya lesa parambana demala jathika sandhanaya mema watina awasthawa magaharimin therim karaka sabhawata pitupama mema prashnaya wisandimata athi pradhanathama badhawa bawa peni yayi.ese nam owun mema therim karaka sabhawata pitupama mema prashnaya wisandimata athi pradhanathama badhawa bawa peni yayi.esenam owun mema therim karaka sabhawata pamina demala janathawage hada gasmath wargika arbudayata thama wisandumath idiripath karamin sakriya dayakayathwayak labadima uthure thama chanda dayakayan wenuwenuth mulu mahath demala jathiya wenuwenuth owun wisin itukala yuthu pradhana wagakima ha yuthukama we.eheth demala janathawatath therim karaka sabhawatath mese pitupamin rajayata chodana mukhayen katha kirime warada owun wisinma piligatha yuthu weyi.
